医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
系统性红斑狼疮中糖皮质激素的剂量减少糖皮质激素是治疗系统性红斑狼疮（SLE）的主要药物。但由于长期的不良影响，减少剂量正成为治疗目标管理目标的重要组成部分。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/Dose-reduction-of-glucocorticoids-in-systemic-lupus-erythematosus.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/Dose-reduction-of-glucocorticoids-in-systemic-lupus-erythematosus.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dae3c94b-471b-4c83-b1b5-3a234c993de4 Thu, 13 Jun 2024 13:09:00 -0400 Dose reduction of glucocorticoids in systemic lupus erythematosus
关于 RA 致病性巨噬细胞血液前体的新见解组织巨噬细胞的确切起源和前体分化途径仍存在争议。在 2024 年 EULAR（欧洲风湿病协会联盟）大会上，新的工作揭示了致病性组织巨噬细胞的血液前体。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/New-insights-into-blood-precursors-of-pathogenic-macrophages-in-RA.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/New-insights-into-blood-precursors-of-pathogenic-macrophages-in-RA.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c8e30853-6501-497d-8175-b065a517c5b3 Thu, 13 Jun 2024 13:04:00 -0400 New insights into blood precursors of pathogenic macrophages in RA
研究证明靶向治疗对早期中轴型脊柱关节炎的疗效炎症性风湿病的早期治疗干预已被证明可以成功地诱导无药物缓解，并且 EULAR（欧洲风湿病协会联盟）建议对关节炎进行早期干预，因为传统的合成疾病缓解抗风湿药 (csDMARD) 已被证明可以减缓关节炎的进展类风湿性关节炎和银屑病关节炎的疾病进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/Study-demonstrates-efficacy-of-treat-to-target-in-early-axis-spondyloarthritis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/Study-demonstrates-efficacy-of-treat-to-target-in-early-axis-spondyloarthritis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=804b8784-4491-42c3-9933-03b64f7c6546 Thu, 13 Jun 2024 13:00:00 -0400 Study demonstrates efficacy of treat-to-target in early axial spondyloarthritis
CHOP 在初级保健网络中实施有效的青少年健康调查问卷虽然医生知道青少年有某些独特的健康问题和担忧，但一些挑战阻碍了以系统的方式收集这些关键信息并为广泛的患者群体提供适当的转诊。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/CHOP-implements- effective-adolescent-health-questionnaire-across-Primary-Care-Network.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/CHOP-implements- effective-adolescent-health-questionnaire-across-Primary-Care-Network.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3e7d3ff2-29ad-4f21-8795-fa33c1505184 Thu, 13 Jun 2024 12:53:34 -0400 CHOP implements effective adolescent health questionnaire across Primary Care Network
研究显示医院工作人员强制接种流感疫苗的人数有所增加在短短几个月内，全国的医院和卫生系统将开始努力为尽可能多的员工接种流感疫苗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/Study-shows-increase-in-mandatory-flu-vaccinations-for-hospital-staff.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/Study-shows-increase-in-mandatory-flu-vaccinations-for-hospital-staff.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=70fd42f9-b195-4535-9517-c337f8125084 Thu, 13 Jun 2024 12:46:49 -0400 Study shows increase in mandatory flu vaccinations for hospital staff
系统评价发现，大约六分之一的患者出现抗抑郁戒断症状研究人员进行了一项荟萃分析，以确定抗抑郁药停药症状的患病率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/Approximately-1-in-6-病人-experience-antidepressant-withdrawal-symptoms-systematic-review-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/Approximately-1-in-6-病人-experience-antidepressant-withdrawal-symptoms-systematic-review-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a1b26c9c-db49-40f9-b000-0c2a8a3ef379 Thu, 13 Jun 2024 10:18:00 -0400 Approximately 1 in 6 patients experience antidepressant withdrawal symptoms, systematic review finds
海尔生物医学提供更好的液氮存储途径海尔生物医学推出了新一代液氮容器，可以轻松便捷地获取储存的样本。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/Haier-Biomedical-offers-improved-access-to-liquid-nitrogen-storage.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/Haier-Biomedical-offers-improved-access-to-liquid-nitrogen-storage.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=032f5a84-f7a2-4370-a9f8-550c3c86cf8f Thu, 13 Jun 2024 09:59:00 -0400 Haier Biomedical offers improved access to liquid nitrogen storage
Unity 2.0 发布：通过一个平台订购、跟踪和管理您的化合物收藏eMolecules 推出了一个新的更新平台，使药物化学家或化合物经理能够通过更直观和灵活的系统订购、跟踪和管理他们的化合物收集和商业来源：Unity。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/Release-of-Unity-20-Order-track-and-manage-your-compound-collection-through-one-platform.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/Release-of-Unity-20-Order-track-and-manage-your-compound-collection-through-one-platform.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d541c297-abe4-4c20-8c44-a773558a4dce Thu, 13 Jun 2024 09:55:00 -0400 Release of Unity 2.0: Order, track, and manage your compound collection through one platform
大规模研究发现植物与动物超加工食品对心血管疾病风险的影响在本研究中，研究人员根据英国人膳食中植物或动物来源的食物种类以及食品加工类别的摄入量，调查了他们的心血管疾病风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/Large-scale-study-presents-findings-on-implications-of-plant-vs-animal-ultra-processed-foods-on-cardioangio-disease-风险.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/Large-scale-study-presents-findings-on-implications-of-plant-vs-animal-ultra-processed-foods-on-cardioangio-disease- risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f0694b78-942d-4dc2-97d6-2fdff8c89bb8 Thu, 13 Jun 2024 09:41:00 -0400 Large-scale study presents findings on implications of plant vs animal ultra-processed foods on cardiovascular disease risk
研究揭示了为什么靶向治疗在一些非小细胞肺癌患者中失败伦敦大学学院、弗朗西斯·克里克研究所和阿斯利康的研究人员发现了非小细胞肺癌的靶向治疗对某些患者（尤其是从未吸烟的患者）不起作用的原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/Study-uncovers-why-targeted-therapy-fails-in-some-non-small-cell-lung-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/Study-uncovers-why-targeted-therapy-fails-in-some-non-small-cell-lung-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e7171443-1b99-4ea4-b027-bd164e3a01f8 Thu, 13 Jun 2024 09:13:00 -0400 Study uncovers why targeted therapy fails in some non-small cell lung cancer patients
